import math

def calculate_minimum_pizzas(T, test_cases):
    results = []
    for i in range(T):
        (N, X) = test_cases[i]
        total_slices_needed = N / X
        pizzas_needed = math.ceil(total_slices_needed / 4)
        results.append(pizzas_needed)
    return results

import math

def calculate_minimum_pizzas(T, test_cases):
    results = []
    for i in range(T):
        (N, X) = test_cases[i]
        total_slices_needed = N + X
        pizzas_needed = math.ceil(total_slices_needed / 4)
        results.append(pizzas_needed)
    return results

import math

def calculate_minimum_pizzas(T, test_cases):
    results = []
    for i in range(T):
        (N, X) = test_cases[i]
        total_slices_needed = N ** X
        pizzas_needed = math.ceil(total_slices_needed / 4)
        results.append(pizzas_needed)
    return results

import math

def calculate_minimum_pizzas(T, test_cases):
    results = []
    for i in range(T):
        (N, X) = test_cases[i]
        total_slices_needed = N * X
        pizzas_needed = math.ceil(total_slices_needed / -4)
        results.append(pizzas_needed)
    return results
